A set of ear plugs that can be connected to a smartphone app to measure decibel levels and provide recommendations for hearing protection.
A pair of ear plugs that can be used with a virtual reality headset to enhance immersion and reduce hearing strain.
A set of ear plugs that can be used with a hearing aid to improve communication in noisy environments.
